svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/69.0.3497.92 Safari/537.36" version="9.1.5" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram id="fac2e3d5-9e94-5cda-8ee6-79f9bfda4ac2" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 40px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
div.div: Client

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 172px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
div.div:
Agent
(Client if On Board Agent)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 66px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
div.div: Transport

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 48px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
div.div: Pairing

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 22px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
div.div: CA

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 148px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Agent gets Device ID and other infos

switch.text: Agent gets Device ID and other infos

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 266px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Agent requests a Credentials Secret for the Client

switch.text: Agent requests a Credentials Secret for the Client

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 148px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Agent delivers Credentials Secret to Device

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 152px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
div.div: Agent Scope Ends

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 278px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Client submits a Credentials request containing a CSR, authenticated with its Credentials Secret

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 128px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Pairing authenticates the request and asks the CA to sign the CSR

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 216px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Pairing replies with the signed certificate

switch.text: Pairing replies with the signed certificate

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 148px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Client uses its Certificate to authenticate against the Transport

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 268px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Transports verifies the certificate against the CA and checks for revocation information

switch.text: Transports verifies the certificate against the CA and checks for revocation information

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 148px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Transport authenticates and registers the Client

switch.text: Transport authenticates and registers the Client

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 148px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Certificate becomes invalid for any reason

switch.text: Certificate becomes invalid for any reason

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 148px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Client disconnects and should reconnect

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 318px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: Client handshakes with Pairing to get information on the transport and verify whether its certificate is valid

switch.text: Client handshakes with Pairing to get information on the transport and verify whether its certificate is valid

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 37px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: If Valid

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 45px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: If Invalid
